div.p: Codes describing surgical procedures. Includes codes from SNOMED CT and ICD-10-PCS. ICD-10-PCS codes are not restricted due to technical limitations, but should be constrained to codes in the Medical and Surgical section. CPT codes are not explicitly included due to licensing restrictions.

description.value: Codes describing surgical procedures. Includes codes from SNOMED CT and ICD-10-PCS. ICD-10-PCS codes are not restricted due to technical limitations, but should be constrained to codes in the Medical and Surgical section. CPT codes are not explicitly included due to licensing restrictions.
